abstract: Flanders Expo center, multipurpose venue in Ghent, Belgium, which is generally used for trade fairs and occasional concerts, will host Davis Cup doubles final between Britain and Belgium; security for event has been increased.
lead_paragraph: Flanders Expo, an arena in Belgium, is the unusual site for this weekend’s finals between Belgium and Britain. Because of recent terrorist attacks and threats, security will be especially tight.

headline.main: Venue for Conventions and Dog Shows Has a New Attraction: The Davis Cup
headline.print_headline: Trade Fair Moves Out as Davis Cup Moves In

snippet: Flanders Expo, an arena in Belgium, is the unusual site for this weekend’s finals between Belgium and Britain. Because of recent terrorist attacks and threats, security will be especially tight.
